Uses of Class
com.projetloki.genesis.BackgroundLayer

  • Packages that use BackgroundLayer 
    Package Description
    com.projetloki.genesis
    A library for generating CSS from Java (Tutorial).

    • Uses of BackgroundLayer in com.projetloki.genesis

      Methods in com.projetloki.genesis that return BackgroundLayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.borderBoxOrigin()
      Sets the background-origin property to 'border-box'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.contentBoxClip()
      Sets the background-clip property to 'content-box'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.contentBoxOrigin()
      Sets the background-origin property to 'content-box'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.fill()
      Sets the background-repeat property to 'no-repeat', and specifies that the image fills the background painting area.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.fillX()
      Sets the x-component of the background-repeat property to 'no-repeat', and specifies that the image fills the width of the background painting area.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.fillY()
      Sets the y-component of the background-repeat property to 'no-repeat', and specifies that the image fills the height of the background painting area.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.fixed()
      Sets the background-attachment property to 'fixed'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.local()
      Sets the background-attachment property to 'local'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.noRepeat()
      Sets the background-repeat property to 'no-repeat'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.noRepeatX()
      Sets the x-component of the background-repeat property to 'no-repeat'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.noRepeatY()
      Sets the y-component of the background-repeat property to 'no-repeat'.
      static BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.of(Image image)
      Returns a new background layer for the given background image.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.paddingBoxClip()
      Sets the background-clip property to 'padding-box'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.position(String cssCode)
      Sets the background-position property, that is the position in the background area at which the image is painted.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.positionPct(double left, double top)
      Sets the background-position property.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.positionPctPx(double left, int top)
      Sets the background-position property.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.positionPx(int left, int top)
      Sets the background-position property, in pixels.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.positionPxPct(int left, double top)
      Sets the background-position proxy.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.round()
      Sets the background-repeat property to 'round'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.roundX()
      Sets the x-component of the background-repeat property to 'round'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.roundY()
      Sets the y-component of the background-repeat property to 'round'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.size(String cssCode)
      Sets the background-size property.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.sizePct(double width, double height)
      Sets the background-size property.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.sizePctPx(double width, int height)
      Sets the background-size property.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.sizePx(int width, int height)
      Sets the background-size property.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.sizePxPct(int width, double height)
      Sets the background-size property.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.space()
      Sets the background-repeat property to 'space'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.spaceX()
      Sets the x-component of the background-repeat property to 'space'.
      BackgroundLayer BackgroundLayer.spaceY()
      Sets the y-component of the background-repeat property to 'space'.
